name: Cozy Place
description:
Pitch 

Make you feel comfortable. 

 

You want to relax ? Grab your favorite drink, resolve some puzzle and create the perfect cozy atomphere you derserve. 

 

Enjoy ! 

 

Game rules 

Take your mouse and click on objects.  

Resolve all puzzles with a cozy mind. 

By Théo Kokel (Prog), Lucas Nayrac (Design), Jonathan Six (Prog), Noé Masse (3D, Lighting), Charlotte Pasquier (Art)
